titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Internal Revenue Service should provide printed copies of Internal Revenue Service Publication 17 to taxpayers in the United States free of charge.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/25/2015--Introduced. This resolution urges the Internal Revenue Service to resume printing copies of Internal Revenue Service Publication 17 ("Your Federal Income Tax") and provide free copies of such publication to taxpayers. Publication 17 provides instruction to individual taxpayers on the preparation of their tax returns.
